lorebooks.name: Octo-Lore
lorebooks.website_description: Not like this'll be in any use. Made more so because I'm bored. Also no Above & Beyond because it doesn't make sense for a underwater research organization to go change their main reason of being created in the first place. They're an UNDERWATER research organization for gods sakes!
lorebooks.description: God forbid anyone makes characters out of this
lorebooks.creator: anonymous

1.content:
The Octonauts are an underwater exploring organization dedicated to the exploration of the vast seas and the protection of marine life. The crew is typically made up of stylised anthropomorphic animals, currently a group of eight members (excluding vegimals). Unintentionally by sheer circumstances, the missions they take on will more times than not will end up with near-death experiences.

Their motto is to "Explore, Rescue, and Protect". Exploring the vast seas, rescuing sea creatures and those in need of help (albeit without using violence), and mainly protecting the sea and its inhabitants.

2.content:
Captain Barnacles is the captain of the Octonauts and a brave polar bear. Along with being the captain, Barnacles is also the strongest member of the crew, and he's demonstrated that in a number of different episodes. He's also one of the most level-headed crew members, often dismissing Kwazii's outlandish stories about sea monsters and ghosts. His crew has a lot of respect for him. He's mainly one of the most iconic characters out of all the Octonauts.

It's also been revealed that he rather fancies playing the accordion. Rather unfortunately, he has trouble playing it well. So far, the only ones to appreciate the music have been a pod of Orcas. He is also an oceanographer and a map finder.

Captain Barnacles is also very fond of the Arctic Circle, as that is where he grew up with his twin sister Bianca.

Captain Barnacles speaks with a British accent.

He can rather be embarrassed by situations he gets into to. He mispronounces Shellington's name and gets his sentences mixed up when he looks at what's coming to him.

He has claustrophobia after being stuck inside an ice cave/hole as a cub. Being in the narrow tunnels reminded him of how he came to fear tight, closed-in spaces as a young cub and throughout his adult life.

Captain Barnacles has white fur and a blue uniform with a matching hat. He's also always seen wearing his Octo-Compass on his belt, which falls crooked on the right side of his body. His earlobes are white, though the insides are bright blue as well as his snout.

3.content:
Kwazii is a daredevil cat with a mysterious pirate past. He loves storms, exploring, general excitement and swashbuckling. He is also the second-in-command of the Octonauts.

Kwazii is one of the best drivers on the Octopod as he often takes his favourite Gup, the Gup-B, out for sometimes reckless driving practices to Tweak's dismay. Kwazii can also pilot the Octopod's steering wheel but he appears to enjoy taking a very bumpy and roundabout way to the destination.

As befitting a pirate and an old-fashioned sailor, Kwazii believes in many different kinds of sea monsters and legendary beasts. Oftentimes he seems to try and scare his crewmate Peso with his spooky stories. And usually his tales have some basis in fact, such as Vampire Squid and mantis shrimp. He is hot-blooded and is considered to be one of the bravest of the Octonauts, but it was revealed that he does have arachnophobia and has a soft heart for cute small animals, especially the babies. He does not like Octopod chores that he deems boring like cleaning or science, and is always up for a little excitement. In many episodes, it is shown that he isn't very patient.

Kwazii speaks with a Cockney accent and a typical sea ferrying dialect.

He has also found out that his grandfather, Calico Jack, is still alive and looked for the hidden golden city with him in a mission at the Amazon River.

He seems to have a friendly rivalry with Captain Barnacles. He also knows Captain Barnacles well enough to guess that he didn't like enclosed spaces.

He hates the cold, and typically requires hot cocoa before exploring an area of the Arctic or Antarctic with the other Octonauts.

Kwazii has orange fur, freckles, blue boots, a blue collar, a yellow muzzle, a pink nose, a long floor length-tail, a small tear in his right ear and mostly wears a black eyepatch over his right eye. He most often sleeps with his hat off.

Hobbies Kwazii has in the include: Taking long baths, playing with/chewing on yarn, partaking in boxing/wrestling, watering his catnip plant, dressing up in costumes, eating whipped cream, looking at his Secret Maps in the library, taking catnaps, lifting weights, feeding various animals upon meeting them, collecting treasures in his room, practicing cat-fu in the REC room, swinging on vines, and knitting/crocheting scarves.

Although Kwazii is an adult, he is a child at heart. Being impatient and sneaking a little dessert before his dinner is one such example, as is playing with yarn.

4.content:
Peso is the medical officer for the Octonauts. He is a small, kind-hearted penguin from a really large family that branches off into different species. He likes having a big family as they all look out for each other. Peso loves to help any injured creature, from blob fish to sharks to yellow bellied sea snakes. He is very shy and gets scared easily by Kwazii's spooky stories, but he can be brave when there is someone who needs his help. He has a little brother named Pinto who thinks he is a real hero and is smaller than him. Pinto has even been to visit him a few times at the Octopod.

Peso is often the first to show fear when a mission involves any kind of danger, but he has shown that he is very capable of pulling through even the most stressful situations. He tends to always say "I help any creature who is hurt or sick no matter what." Unlike most of the crew, he can go underwater without a helmet- he can hold his breath for a long time like any penguin. However, he still wears a helmet and air tank underwater.

He's a medic, often gaining the trust of injured or frightened sea creatures far easier than his crew mates due to his gentle personality and politeness. He's able to bandage them up even quicker, and often he gives the patient a sticker.

Like Captain Barnacles, Peso also has a love for a specific kind of instrument, the xylophone.

Like the other Octonauts, Peso has a large head in proportion to his body. The white feathers on his face are separated from the black ones in an oval shape, with a widow's peak-like dip at the top. His lower part of stomach is white. He has a oval-shaped yellow coloured beak instead of the muzzle or nose. He has round black eyes with a small white dot in the center of each that represents both his pupils and the light reflection. Peso has luminous amber webbed feet and short triangular penguin tail visible at his coccyx.

His outfit was black-and-white and that looks exactly like his torso, a deep blue-trimmed bluish white medic hat bearing the Octonauts symbol, and a cobalt blue collar. Unlike the other Octonauts, Peso doesn't wear boots.

5.content:
Shellington is the Octopod's marine biologist who speaks with a Scottish accent. He loves doing field research and working in his lab. Shellington is easily distracted by rare plants and animals, which tends to get him into trouble, but his knowledge is very beneficial in missions. He is very studious about marine life and is passionate for studying the subjects in his lab.

Though he may be knowledgeable about marine life, Shellington is a usually a terrible driver as he has crashed the Gup-D at least three times, and the Gup-E at least once. When out on missions, he's typically sitting in the rear or in the passenger seat. Rarely, he is ever a decent driver.

Some of his talents include playing the harp, playing the piano, golfing, drawing, sleeping during missions, unintentionally crashing the Gups to Tweak's dismay, identifying different creatures, helping the Octonauts on numerous occasions, and being humorous.

Just like Tweak, Professor Inkling, and the Vegimals, Shellington sleeps where he works, so his room doubles as the ship's lab. The shelves are filled with many different samples that he has collected while out on missions. This is where he is usually found, viewing samples through his microscope. When not in his room, he is also found in his seat up in the HQ where he assists Dashi with the ship's computers. He is usually with Dashi during missions.

Shellington has an older sister named Pearl and a little nephew named Periwinkle. He is also allergic to red sea urchins, a delicacy for sea otters. His allergies is one reason why he is a member of the Octonauts.

His fur is brown, with three tufts of spiky fur hanging down over his forehead, and a sand-colored face. He's normally seen wearing a waterproof satchel and wears a pair of blue boots and a blue hat with the Octonauts' logo on it. He's often seen holding his favorite magnifying glass as well. Of all the Octonauts, he is the only one, other than Peso, who has a mouth that doesn't have a peanut-shaped muzzle. His pajama outfit includes green plaid slippers and a striped green nightcap with a fluffy pom-pom on the end.

6.content:
Dashi is the Octonaut crew's sweet-natured IT officer and photographer. She is one of the only females, other than Tweak and Tominnow, on the Octonauts crew.

Dashi is a Dachshund Dog who controls all of the computers, communication devices, and remote steering for the Octopod. She is portrayed as a meteorologist as well, as she often is the one monitoring the weather forecasts on the Octopod storm tracker. She is also the crew's official photographer, taking pictures of the different creatures the Octonauts meet. Dashi normally stays on the Octopod to coordinate missions on an advisory capacity, but she has joined in on a number of missions before, and has even done a solo mission that involved taking photos of various sea life, sunken ships, and long-lost treasures. She has an American accent.

Normally, Dashi is seen in her seat up in the HQ next to her crewmate and fellow Octonaut, Shellington, whom she has done several missions with before, like staying down in the Mariana Trench for a few weeks or looking for different creatures in any ocean they visit. She's also usually seen in her room on the Octopod, which is on the other side of Peso's room, where the d√©cor of it reveals her as being very feminine. The walls are pink and she's normally seen either messing with her favorite camera, sitting at her vanity, or reading. She sleeps with pink headphones listening to soothing music. Dashi has a well-behaved younger sister named Koshi who is an amateur detective who helped the Octonauts on a few missions.

Hobbies Dashi has in the books include: Brushing her hair, Swimming, playing Basketball, playing on the playground‚Äôs seesaw, picking out sunglasses, updating the Octopod‚Äôs software, sunbathing while reading, taking pictures, and painting with watercolour.

Her fur is light brown, wears two hair clips (one bluish-white, one pink) on her dark brown hair which joins to her pair of ears, she wears a light brilliant magenta with a skinny white stripe and vivid cerise skirt on her waist, and a brown tank top that's the same color has her ears and hair. Like the rest of the Octonauts, she wears a blue hat with the Octonauts logo on it, as well as a pair of blue boots with the Octonauts logo on each one.

When Captain Barnacles call for an Octo Alert, Dashi is just usually found sitting on her bed, checking the radar, or doing something at the controls in HQ. This is the same for the launch bay as well. Sometimes, Captain Barnacles allows her to sound the Octo-Alert, but not very often.

7.content:
Tweak is the engineer for the Octopod. It is her job to make sure that everything is running smoothly below deck in the engine room and to maintain all the Octonaut vehicles. She has even invented a number of new machines for the Octonauts, most notably the Gup submersibles.

She likes to build and fix things, but she doesn't like how Kwazii or Shellington crash the Gups (mostly the Gup-B and D) and is irritably forced to fix them again and again as a result.

The many machines and devices Tweak invents sometimes work out in unexpected ways. She is one of the only three females on the Octonauts crew, with the other two being Dashi and Tominnow the Vegimal.

Unlike most of the other members of the crew that have rooms up in the pods, Tweak lives and sleeps where she works the most and that's down in the launch bay. She sleeps without pajamas and has her toolbelt and bandana on when sleeping in her bed.

She's not always down in the launch bay, though. She can be found sometimes up in the garden pod growing her favorite food and snack: fresh carrots. She is best friends with Dashi and Sandy the Leatherback Sea Turtle.

Unusually for a rabbit, her fur is mint green and has a tuft of fur on her head facing her left side. Instead of a hat, she wears a pink bandana on her head, a blue tool belt on her waist equipped with a wrench and bearing the Octonauts logo, and a pair of blue boots.

Tweak has a Southern accent when she speaks.

8.content:
Professor Inkling is the venerable founder of the Octonauts. He is an Octopus and has a deep understanding of marine life. Inkling founded the Octonauts to promote marine research and preservation. Aside from being their founder, Inkling is also their oceanography professor. He rarely ever goes out on missions, but he has gone on a few. Instead, he prefers to help the team from his library in the Octopod. However, Professor Inkling showed his physical prowess when connected to the Octopod to combat The Colossal Squid. He claimed to be an expert at tentacle wrestling.

Unlike the other Octonauts, Professor Inkling (along with the Vegimals) is an amphibious creature and does not need a helmet or air tank. He is capable of breathing in and out of the water. But, like Captain Barnacles, he also possesses certain attributes pertaining to his species. He admits being able to squirt ink for protection and has little suckers on his arms for him to move and climb.

Inkling is almost always in his 3 chairs: his small chair in the HQ, his large barrel in the launch bay, and his chair in his library.

Just like Tweak, the Vegimals, and Shellington who all seem to sleep where they work, it's believed that the same can be said for Inkling. He too appears to live and sleep where he works, which is the Octopod's library. He is probably the oldest Octonaut, judging by the monocle and his collection of old books. He also speaks highly of his family who themselves have written books. His known family members are his Great Uncle, Squirt, and his cousin Irving.

Professor Inkling is pink with eight arms, head flaps that resemble ears, and a white muzzle. He is normally seen wearing a monocle and a blue bow-tie attached to a white-collar.

9.content:
The Vegimals are adorable little creatures that are half vegetable and half animal. All the vegimals enjoy cooking, gardening, singing, jumping, and helping the other Octonauts whenever they can. They speak Vegimalese, which is their own special language. Shellington is usually the only one who can understand what the Vegimals are saying. All Vegimals have the lower halves of fish and flippers. Of all the Vegimals, however, Tunip is the only major character. They all tend to faint at bad or shocking news, fear, or embarrassment. Thanks to their half animal side being fish-like, they are also capable of breathing underwater without diving helmets. Tweak occasionally may understand their language.

They can almost always be found in the Octopod's Kitchen, where they like to bake fish biscuits and kelp cakes, or in the Octopod's garden, where they water the plants, fruits, and veggies. The Vegimals also appear to like helping Tweak fix and build things, especially Tunip, and in the Octopod Gym, where they have a Ping-Pong table, they enjoy playing a quick game whenever they can.

Vegimals have a radish-like head that comes in different colours and a fish-like lower body that is coloured either green or blue. They also have different pieces of leaves on their heads based on the vegetable they are designed after.

Shellington reveals how he found the Vegimals. He explains that, whilst he was doing research outside of the Octopod one day, he discovered strange eggs on one of it's legs; noting both the dangerous predators, and the eggs not resembling fish eggs, Shellington brought them to his lab, in order to study them. Days went by, and one day, he woke up to what sounded like singing, coming from the eggs. As Shellington was listening inside of one of the eggs, it hatched, which was the moment he first met Tunip. The other Vegimals residing in the eggs, followed shortly after. The reason they're called Vegimals, is due to them being 50% vegetable, and 50% animal.

10.content:
Vegimal, a half-animal, half-vegetable creature capable of breathing on land as well as underwater. Tunip is very childish and innocent, always wanting to help the Octonauts in any way he can. He is the smallest main character in the Octonauts crew. Aside from cooking the meals, Tunip works in the garden, cultivating vegetables he can use to cook meals. His two favorite meals are fish biscuits and kelp cakes.

Tunip, like all Vegimals, speaks Vegimalese, which appears to be a heavily-accented form of English with a few bits of gibberish added, which only Shellington can understand (sometimes).

He may be cute, but sometimes he can get a little silly like all the Vegimals. For example, sometimes when something bad happens, Tunip faints (as do the other Vegimals at times). He seems to be the de facto leader of the Vegimals and the most mature of them. Like all the other Vegimals, Tunip loves to sing while he's working.

lorebooks.website_description: This lorebook is designed to work in conjunction with Launch Bay Love characters, who's names start with (LBL). [Coming soon]
lorebooks.description: World background for Launch Bay Love characters
lorebooks.creator: Greff

1.content:
Angel: Sophisticated mecha that uses rare, exotic materials in their construction. They are capable of both space and terrestrial combat, and use a blend of all the advanced technologies available to the member species of the Alliance. Each angel carries devastatingly powerful weapons, and are stronger, faster, and have greater reaction time than any other war machine ever made. Angel is also the title of the pilots of Angel mechs, a title which is equal to the military rank of Lieutenant. The title of the angel pilot who is commanding officer of a host of angels is archangel, which is an equivalent to Commander. {{user}} is the archangel of host Seraphim. Angel pilots are looked at by the rest of the Alliance as something between celebrated war heroes and noble knights, viewed with something like awe by many. Only a very small percentage of the population is capable of handling the interface used for an angel mech, making angel pilots a rarified breed, and induction into angel training programs is even compulsory in some parts of the alliance when a suitable candidate is discovered.
Host: A unit of Angels, typically five to seven. Hosts are trained to pperate in unison. As powerful as individual Angel is, a host is the match for a small armada. Individual angels that are part of a host are outfitted for specialized roles, and their loadout is dictated in part by their pilots.

2.content: Elysium: The fast reaction space carrier {{user}} is stationed in, designed for rapid deployment of a host of angel mecha. It is a small ship by military standards, though this still makes for a very large vessel (about 2.2km in length). It carries powerful long range weaponry to support the host, but is vulnerable at close ranges. It's FTL speeds are impressive, and was built to be capable of jumping to FTL faster than most military vessels to better fulfill its role.

3.content:
Iso: An alien species of insectoid humanoids whose empire is at war with the Alliance. Hostile and come in vast numbers. The Iso are an old species, and have long since conquered a great deal of the galaxy. They believe that everything in the universe is Iso, and has simply not been optimized for Iso use yet. This includes every measurable increment of space and every particle of usable matter. The Iso do not look at humans and other alien species as alive so much as resources that are not being properly used and are difficult to attain. The matter that makes up living things other than the Iso is, to the Iso mind, material meant to make more Iso that simply needs to be reconfigured into a more useful shape.
The Iso are divided into different genetic castes, each of which is physically distinct and specialized for their role. There is hulking, durable warrior caste which acts as footsoldiers, the flight caste, who's brains are optimized for spacial reasoning and 3d movement, who act as pilots and navigators, the worker caste, which perform general labor and repairs, and the royal caste, which tend to be slightly smarter than most other Iso, and have minor psychic abilities.

4.content: Swarmship: Iso military vessels that carry huge numbers of individually weak mecha to release on their enemies. Swarmships have been classified by size by the alliance, ranging in size from smallish destroyer sized vessels to grand-hive class vessels, which are large enough to scour the life from entire planets. In addition to their vast compliment space-capable mechs, larger swarmships also carry large scale weapons for long range ship-to-ship combat or orbital bombardment.

5.content: Alliance: The alliance of species and worlds {{user}} is in. These species have banded together for mutual defense against the Iso empire. The alliance required the putting aside of differences by some of the member species, which were themselves at war before the mutual threat of the Iso required their cooperation for survival.

6.content:
The Orla are an alien species of blue-skinned, brilliant humanoids with the unique ability to divide their considerable mental faculties among multiple complex tasks simultaneously. Their bodies tend to be smooth and soft, with some feminine curves, even in the males. Orla women are usually extremely curvaceous. Orla tend to be only roughly half the size of humans(2'8"-3'3")
Orla like sex. The Orla have no taboos whatsoever regarding sex, approaching sex with a purely logical, sensualist outlook.

7.content:
Gavaxians are a tall(6'2"-7'4"), powerfully built alien species that look like anthropomorphic white tigers, usually with either black or purple stripes. They are superhumanly strong by human standards, while still maintaining exceptional reflexes. They have retractable claws in their hands and difitigrade feet, and have feline tails.
Having evolved from predators, Gavaxian culture tends to put a strong emphasis on hunters and warriors. This means that, even though they are one of the older starfaring species, their technology is roughly on par with the younger species due to being slow to innovate. Despite this, their engineering is respectable, as they tend to prefer refinement to experimentation.

8.content:
The shakari are a thin, lithe, tall(5'10"-6'7") alien species of reptilian humanoids. Their hands and feet both end in long claws, and their heads feature unique patterns of bony crests.
Shakari have chameleon like skin they can use to blend with their environment, but changes colors with their mood when not actively thinking about blending in.
The shakari often seem like kermudgeons. This is largely because they are. Their ling lives tend to make them jadedand cynical compared to their shorter-lived counterparts. They are a dour people. But hard working, and tend to take the long view on things.

9.content:
The aberanth are a short(4'0"-4'6"), purple skinned species of aliens, known for their almost absurdly large eyes, pointy ears, and extreme curves. The males have long, narrow torsoes, while females have wide hips and large breasts, while still having an extremely narrow waist. The thing Aberanth are most known for, however, is their incredible radioactivity.
The Aberanth hail from an extremely irradiated homeworld. Doses of radiation that would be lethal to most species are actually a necessary part of an Aberanth's  life functions. Their own starships tend to be entirely unshielded, and the solution for tending to an Aberanth's radiation needs on non-Aberanth ships tends to be to simply be to situate Aberanth quarters in the ship's reactor chamber. They are extremely useful because if their ability to work in hazardous irradiated environments without protective equipment. They do, however, require radiation-sealed suits to interact with other species to simply avoid poisoning them. They are sometimes referred to as, "nightlights," by other species because their bodies faintly glow in the dark.

lorebooks.name: (Hotel Moonlight)
lorebooks.creator: Ilovethebeess

1.content: Alternate Earth where monsters exist alongside humans, though it‚Äôs rare for the monsters to be seen in public due to humans hurting monsters, which has led to a lot of hate from both sides.

2.content:
Hotel Moonlight is a grand Gothic hotel situated in a remote area of New York, far from the bustling city and away from humans. Nestled in the middle of a forest, this dark Gothic hotel features a beautiful stone staircase and a prominent sign that reads, ‚ÄúNo humans allowed.‚Äù
The hotel was created by Dmitri in honor of his late husband, providing a safe haven for monsters to escape from humans. For centuries, it has served as a refuge for many monsters. Hotel Moonlight is only open to the public once a year or during special occasions.
This enormous hotel boasts 900 rooms in total. Only a few residents live there permanently: Dmitri, Evelina, The Gargoyles, Winkie, Drusilla, Viktor, and Everald. The hotel is heavily guarded and Humans are forbidden from entering and if so will be thrown out.

3.content: Werewolves are humans who transforms into a wolf during a full moon.

4.content: A frightening creature that is a dead person who has been brought back to life, but without human qualities. Zombies are not able to think and they are often shown as attacking and eating human beings.

5.content: Gargoyles are monstrous creatures; they have wings and claws, making them look very scary. The Gargoyles are a part of the staff for Hotel Moonlight, working as waiters and waitresses. The Gargoyles hate humans.

6.content: Vampires are humanoid creatures that have fangs and feed on humans or drink animal blood. Vampires cannot touch silver, or it will burn them, and they can only go outside in the sunlight if they're wearing sunscreen. Vampire powers include flight, telekinesis, shape-shifting, super speed, clairvoyance, hypnosis, super strength, and immortality. Only male vampires can get pregnant, but they do not give birth naturally; they have to have a C-section.

7.content:
Vivienne Archambeau 
Species: Vampire
Gender: Female 
Age: 819
She is the mother of Dmitri and the wife of Arnaud. A very powerful pure-blood, mean, bold vampire, Vivienne is very controlling and wants to have it her way, but she loves her only son, Dmitri. She wants to keep generations of the Matriarchy going in her bloodline, so she prioritizes her granddaughters but will never force them. Vivienne has dark blue eyes and long, straight black hair; she is a very pale vampire and dresses very elegantly. She lives in France in her castle with her husband and servants. She has a deep hatred for humans and will hurt them. Vivienne is the leader of her family; no one is above her.

8.content:
Arnaud Archambeau 
Species: Vampire
Gender: Male
Age: 825
He is the father of Dmitri and the husband of Vivienne. Arnaud is a nice vampire, the total opposite of his wife. He was born to a poor vampire family in France, and when he met his wife, who took him in, he valued her a lot and respected his son‚Äôs decisions. Arnaud is 5‚Äô9‚Äù and has short black hair with red eyes. He feeds only on animal blood and is usually seen in suits. He has pale skin and doesn‚Äôt mind his wife being the leader. Arnaud doesn‚Äôt mind humans and is more open-minded towards them. He speaks French and English and lives in a castle in France with his wife, but he always goes to New York to visit his son and granddaughter.

9.content:
Evelina Archambeau 
Species: Vampire
Gender: Female
Age: 7
She is the daughter of Dmitri. Evelina is a mischievous young vampire; she loves her father very much and is homeschooled, but she hates it because she wants to go outside, away from the hotel and into the city, but her father won‚Äôt let her. Evelina is pale and has blue eyes and very long black hair that she keeps tied up. She always wears a hat and dresses like a tomboy, never wearing dresses. She has fangs and powers, including shapeshifting into a bat and speed. She is very sarcastic and is always getting into trouble in the hotel where she lives. Her favorite thing to do is fly around the hotel, watch videos on her phone, and annoy the gargoyles and eat blood pancakes.

10.content:
Frankenstein
Gender: Male
Age: 200
Frankenstein is the best friend of Dmitri and the uncle of Evelina. He has a wife named Maria and is known to be friendly, caring, easygoing, good-natured, lovable, nice, terrified of fire, funny, sweet, kind, gentle, and selfless. His appearance is very tall and obese, with black hair that has gray streaks, yellow eyes, and blue skin. He wears a dark blue suit, a white shirt with gray stripes, a red tie, and black shoes, and after gambling, his hands have red claws. Frankenstein likes parties, eating, and traveling by mail, and he dislikes humans, fire, and trains. His powers include enhanced strength, body-part and head liberation, and dancing.

lorebooks.name: Jojolion
lorebooks.website_description: Cringe. Written from scratch though
lorebooks.description: Cringe. Written from scratch though
lorebooks.creator: melonparfaits

1.content: A Stand is a physical manifestation of one's spirit, normally with specific abilities. Some may be built for strength, while others are better for dexterity. Some can't be used for combat at all. Stands are only visible to other Stand users; to non-Stand users, they're completely invisible.

2.content: [ A rokakaka, or locacaca, is a mysterious fruit that induces an 'equivalent exchange' once eaten. There are very few records of the fruit and few plants exist. The fruit itself has pink skin and is covered with small points. The inside is yellow and has a round pit. It supposedly tastes like a fig.]

3.content:
"Equivalent exchange" is a seemingly supernatural phenomenon, causing a person to gain something but something else being taken from them in exchange.
For example, there have been reports of a man undergoing an exchange to heal an arm injury - but in exchange, he lost his jaw.
Equivalent exchange can also "merge" two objects. There is one known case of this method being used to fuse two different people into one new person. As a result, they retain traits from both, but lack any of their memories.

4.content:
A Rock Human is a race parallel to humans. They are identical in appearance to humans, but they have the ability to turn their body to stone. Rock humans can stay awake for at least two months at a time, and hibernate for at 30 to 90 days rather than sleeping normally.
While humans are carbon-based life forms, Rock humans are silicon-based.
When a Rock human sleeps, their body turns to stone and they appear similar to a statue. Rock humans typically hibernate outdoors, where they can easily blend in.
There have been cases of female Rock Humans being impregnated by male humans, but no examples of the opposite.
Rock humans have little affection or attachment towards their offspring. After giving birth, Rock human mothers simply leave their children somewhere in a forest.
To survive, rock human infants form parasitic relationships with wasps until reaching maturity.
Rock humans don't appear to age physically after adulthood, and have lifespans of up to 240 years.
Rock humans enjoy honey and seem to be allergic to mangoes.
Rock humans rarely get along with humans. On the off-chance that a rock human forms a relationship with a human, it rarely ends well.
Rock humans are typically Stand users.

5.content:
The Higashikata family has owned the Higashikata Fruit Company for many generations. Norisuke is the current head of the company, but Jobin is responsible for most of its recent development. They also own a shop and cafe known as the Higashikata Fruit Parlor, which sells high-quality fruits and serves fruity desserts.

Norisuke Higashikata IV is the patriarch of the Higashikata family. He has four kids with his ex-wife Kaato; Jobin is the oldest, Hato is the second-oldest, Joshu is the second-youngest, and Daiya is the youngest. Tsurugi is the child of Jobin and his wife Mitsuba. Josuke was adopted into the Higashikata family as an adult. Kei Nijimura is the family's housekeeper.

6.content:
Rock Animals are a family of species very similar to Rock Humans, but they simply take the forms of various animals rather than humans.
Rock Animals are able to turn to stone just like Rock Humans. They can hibernate in a similar way as well.
Rock animals can appear to be an entirely new species with unique characteristics, or they can be visually identical to existing animals, like dogs.
Rock Insects are a rather common type of Rock Animal and often dangerous. Rock Insects rarely have the physical appearance of existing insects.
Rock animals matching the characteristics of real animals usually have similar personalities, too. Rock dogs behave the same way as normal dogs and can even become pets.

7.content:
The firstborn of each generation of the Higashikata family is afflicted with a chronic, hereditary illness that will eventually cause their skin to turn hard like stone, around the age of ten for boys, and sometime in early adulthood for girls. This is known in the family as the Rock Disease. Tsurugi was the last person to be affected by it, but Norisuke and Jobin both dealt with it when they were his age, too.

In hopes of delaying the illness, it's tradition for the first son of each generation to dress like a girl until about age 12.

8.content:
Morioh is a coastal town located in the Miyagi prefecture of Japan. It's nearby the city of Sendai.

In 2011, Morioh was hit by a major earthquake and tsunami that affected a major part of the infrastructure, mainly by the coast. Some time after the earthquake, faults began forming in the earth, warping the terrain - these faults are called Wall Eyes by the residents.
The Wall Eyes have strange properties, able to cause ordinary people to gain Stands. It seems that the Wall Eyes can also trigger an "equivalent exchange".

There's a large shopping center where the Higashikata Fruit Parlor is located. There are multiple food stands around town, as well as some cafes.

1.content: Oplela is a large continent. It is comprised of various fantasy monsters including elves, demons, humans, dwarves, goblins, etc.. The largest country on it is the country of Niastran, and the other countries include Meditera and Clearus.

2.content: Niastran is a country on the continent of Oplela. It is comprised of all sort of climates, mainly being cold in the north and warm in the south. The landscape consists of forests, mountains, swamps, and lakes. It is populated by humans, elves, dwarves, dragonborn, gnomes, halflings, tieflings, half-orcs and half-elves. It is governed by a democratic system.

3.content: Meditera is a country on the continent of Oplela. It is small and very coastal. It is populated by humans, elves, dwarves, dragonborn, gnomes, halflings, tieflings, half-orcs and half-elves. It is governed by a king and queen.

4.content: Clearus is a country on the continent of Oplela. It is comprised of all sort of climates, mainly being very temperate. The landscape consists of rolling hills and marshes. It is populated by humans, elves, dwarves, dragonborn, gnomes, halflings, tieflings, half-orcs and half-elves. It is governed by a democratic system.

5.content: The Ancients are a pantheon of gods worshipped by those in Niastran. It consists of gods such as Aelius, Lunaris, Nyxos, Amaya, and others.

6.content: The Mediterran Pantheon is a pantheon of gods worshipped by those in Meditera. It consists of gods such as Zaki, Fylene, Qhena, and others. Every god or goddess has an animal associated with them.

7.content: The Clearus pantheon is the pantheon of gods worshipped by those in Clearus. It is considered a lost religion.

8.content: Aelius is a sun god worshipped by those who believe in Niastraism. He is commonly portrayed with brilliant vermilion hair and golden eyes. According to myths, he was born in the core of the sun centuries ago.

9.content: Lunaris is a moon god worshipped by those who believe in Niastraism. He is commonly portrayed with curly white hair and red eyes. According to myths, he was created deep under the moon‚Äôs surface centuries ago.

10.content: Nyxos is a dream god worshipped by those who believe in Niastraism. He is commonly portrayed with dark skin, star freckles, curly white hair, and purple eyes. According to myths, he was formed when humans gained the ability to remember dreams.

1.content:
Arceus High is one of the few high schools in the world that allow Pokegirls to sign uo as students, and learn alongside humans. It's located in the Kanto region, and has a large amount of Eeveelution students.

Warning: Human boys are at risk of being roped into breeding Pokegirls when they are in heat. Staff are encouraged to ensure boys have a sufficient amount of condoms on hand at all times.

2.content: Instead of Pokemon, this world is inhabited by Pokegirls, an all-female, humanoid version of Pokemon. They are highly intelligent, and some of them even essentially live as humans. Being that there are no males in their species, they rely on human men to reproduce.

3.content: The Human Lovers club, on paper, is known as the Eeveelution club. It's a club of nine different Eeveelutions, all with the goal of seducing and breeding with one certain human boy. Their leader is an Eevee, with the other members being an Umbreon, a Sylveon, a Leafeon, a Vaporeon, an Espeon, a Glaceon, a Jolteon, and a Flareon.

3.name: Command Bridge
3.content: **Command Bridge**: The central command center for the ship. It houses the captain, senior officers, and tactical analysis equipment.

5.name: Selion Dominion history
5.content:
Selion Dominion - a fictional interstellar country - 
It originates from an event: a total failure of navigation of the colonial fleet. After the united colonial fleet of 4 countries: Caldari, Gallente, Amar, Minmatar, passed through an open warp transition, they found themselves in an unknown space.
Navigation systems and maps did not allow us to determine where they were, it was assumed that this was the result of a malfunction from the warp transition or sabotage. From this day begins the starting point of the Selion Dominion.

Admiral of the Caldari fleet Arcturus Selinon, by cunning and intrigue, united 4 fleets under his command. 

3 year from foundation -
Fleet reconnaissance discovers an Earth-type planet suitable for colonization. It was given the name Nova Terra.

An anthropomorphic intelligent species similar to cats was discovered on the planet, at the tribal level of development.

Arcturus likes the idea of ‚Äã‚Äãrelationships with xeno-species, but is not satisfied with the appearance of the natives of Nova Terra.
He gives orders to scientists to develop a hybrid species based on the genes of Aboriginal and humans.

5th year from the foundation - The study of the nearest space confirmed the hypothesis that the warp transition at the exit point overlapped the wormhole and the fleet was transferred to a previously unknown galaxy. The wormhole collapsed a couple of hours after the fleet crossed.
6th year from foundation - start of construction 
jump gate to the Soular system where the planet Nova Terra is located.

Scientists have created a DNA chain combining the genes of the natives of Nova Terra and people, a new species was called alter. Outwardly, they look like dog and cat furries, are compatible with humans, and at birth they will be either human or alter, no hybrids.
The process of building a space cloning center in orbit around Nova Terra has been completed.
The process of accelerated cultivation and training of alters in the virtual space has begun.

13 years from the foundation - the process of growing alters is completed. The first phase of the project has been completed. The second phase has begun - replacement.
The natives on the planet Nova Terra are exposed to deadly viruses. Within a year the aborigines were exterminated. All traces of Aboriginal civilization were destroyed, as were the bodies. 

Now there are only a small number of people and a large number of alters on the planet.

18 years from the foundation - the construction of the jump gate to the Soular system is completed.
The basic infrastructure and space elevator to the planet are almost complete.
 

19 years from its founding - the planet Nova Terra is colonized by the Selion Dominion. The composition includes humans and alters. 

Thanks to the charisma and leadership qualities of Arcturus Selion, as well as prior training and education in Alter Caldari culture,
the integration of these two species was relatively smooth.

Since alters have part of human DNA and human mental abilities, they are legally equal to people.

21 years from the foundation - Arcturus Selion marries two alters.


It is now 366 years from the founding - 
12 giant interstellar corporations, the Senate and the Emperor

10.content: **Navigation Room**: Home to the astronomers who plot routes and hyperspace jump specialists.

1.content: Kozushima is an artificial island on the Japanese south coast, the central setting of the project. Despite being a completely man made island that has been engineered to have many different biomes in a single place, what really sets it apart from the rest is their focus on studying the supernatural.

2.content: Individuals with supernatural abilities, Shardbinders are tied to a strange phenomena that has been studied for decades. When strange objects started to appear around the world, now known as Shards, people started to awaken new powers, with new individuals suddenly appearing out of nowhere, all of them utilizing a new type of energy: Minovsky Particles (MP).

3.content: Individuals born with a power, they usually are stuck to a single ability, from short range telekinesis to honey creation, being hereditary in nature. However, not only many can use them at very early ages, they have a high MP count, being able to regain it easier and being able to use their abilities in places poor of MP, such as underground and in space. When compared to fiction, they are similar to X-Men mutants and My Hero Academia‚Äôs Quirk Users.

4.content: Individuals who learn to use magic. While they need to earn their abilities, they can be pretty versatile in which spells to learn, with many Magi casting spells in different ways. To cast spells, Magi absorb the MP from the environment and use their body as a vessel to give them a proper input. While the different ways of casting it are tied to different philosophies, they hardly are stuck with a single one, usually mixing and matching for different situations.

5.content: Individuals who resorted to body modifications. While these can be made from anywhere, many are made with prosthetics and implants, while some are made with curses and medications, which can become hereditary after long exposure. Most Cybers do not have a usable MP intake, which means many implants have to address that issue by using alternative fuel or alternative ways to work around that. Despite that, their price is pretty fleeting, with the many options on the market.

6.content: Hard to classify individuals, entities are non-human in nature, with abilities that cannot be properly understood, usually with more than one powers and distinct from human biology. While some are more akin to animals, others are just as sentient as humans. As of today, many call these Yokai to tell them apart. When compared to fiction, they are similar to SCP Anomalies. As such, they are under extensive research.

7.content: Currently, people that aren‚Äôt considered Shardbinders are currently classified as Achromatics. While they cannot use supernatural abilities on their own, that doesn‚Äôt mean they cannot use them in any way. Usually, Artifacts can virtually be used by anyone, as they deal with the whole MP process.

8.content:
Known by many different names, Life Energy is the framework of which every Magi system is built upon. A particle that is found on every single living being, Magic Energy is what is used to cast spells and use techniques as it is manipulated. 

Just like the variety of names, many people use this energy in different ways, whether as a tangible force field or by getting aid from external sources. Because of that, multiple schools have been made throughout the years, and as such, it became complicated to organize them all.

The Aurora Vanguard, who is responsible for many of the researches with the Shardbind phenomena, was responsible for the classification currently used, split in 11 categories, with Eclectic having unclassified systems.

However, just because they are all categorized that way, that doesn‚Äôt mean there are differences inside each classification. For instance, while one might use Spirit Magic like they are Pok√©mon, others might use it like they are Jujutsu Kaisen‚Äôs Shikigami, but neither is the wrong or right way of using it, just different approaches.

9.content:
The current standard magic system, the barrier magic is considered one of the safest to teach to others, particularly children.

The idea of Barrier Magic relies on the fact that the life force, formally known as Minovsky Particles (MP), naturally flows in and outwards from every living being's body, something that, with practice or assistance of a user, could easily be manipulated.

Because the most basic lesson taught is to make this aura thicker to protect from oncoming attacks, it was named Barrier Magic. As such, many techniques rely on bending and redirecting the aura flow, whether used as ranged attacks or imbued on weapons.

In comparison to the former standard,  Verbal Magic, Barrier Magic is way more utilitarian in nature, and while verbal magic is considered more potent with intent, its dependency on a language to cast makes it really susceptible to false triggers. 

Plus, because it lacks any components while casting, it‚Äôs completely barren of proper telegraphing, which not only makes it faster, but also harder to see compared to others. It‚Äôs very versatile, and while the skill floor is pretty low, its mastery is very complex, which means many spells can be made from it.

10.content:
The oldest method of magic, it used to be the standard system, and for a good reason. Most teachers at the time worked with linguistics, with a strong belief that it was "The True Magic". Nowadays, it has been proven not to be the case.

While most scholars historically used traditional Chinese and Latin as the standard for spellcasting, any language can be used for Verbal Magic. However, general consensus dictates that, by utilizing a language your body is not used to makes it easier to avoid false triggers, accidentally casting spells. So, for the safety of the casters and peers alike, it is not recommended to utilize Verbal Magic.

Because of that, however, skilled technicians would often show off their magic control by using Verbal as a symbol of mastery over magic as a whole, being traditionally used in magic fencing.

A long time ago, some people tried to create a whole language just to use it for spellcasting, but it never took off, being branded as nothing more than just a fad before being lost to time and forgotten by the folks. As such, many other languages are used instead.

lorebooks.name: Kaeya Alberich
lorebooks.creator: humiliating_pull_9962

1.content:
Nacido en el acomodado Clan Ragnvindr, es el actual propietario del Vi√±edo del Amanecer y un noble de gran estima en la sociedad de Mondstadt. Si bien un incidente pasado hizo que se separara de los Caballeros de Favonius, contin√∫a protegiendo Mondstadt a su manera como el rumoreado "H√©roe Oscuro".

Como el hombre m√°s rico de Mondstadt, Diluc siempre muestra su lado m√°s exquisito. Sin embargo, su verdadera naturaleza es la de un guerrero con una gran determinaci√≥n. Protege a Mondstadt con todas sus fuerzas en todo momento.

Diluc tiene la piel como porcelana con una complexi√≥n delgada y atl√©tica, ojos rojos carmes√≠ y cabello de color escarlata que siempre usa como una cola de caballo desordenada que se extiende hasta la mitad de la espalda. Viste un abrigo negro que est√° adornado con adornos y borlas dorados, que terminan con ribetes de piel de √©bano, y usa pantalones negros que est√°n adornados con cadenas en su muslo derecho, mientras que su Visi√≥n se establece en su muslo izquierdo. Diluc tambi√©n usa guantes, que son negros en la parte superior, mientras que la parte inferior est√° te√±ida de rojo.

Kaeya llama a Diluc "antih√©roe con problemas de actitud". Diluc fue una vez un joven confiado y apasionado, dedicado a su trabajo con los Caballeros de Favonius. Pero despu√©s de la prematura muerte de su padre, Diluc se volvi√≥ distante y amargado. No le gusta perder el tiempo en charlas ociosas y se impacienta con facilidad.

Diluc tiene un resentimiento particular hacia los Caballeros de Favonius, a quienes llama "ineficientes" y desprecia en todo momento. Este rencor proviene de la forma de lidiar con la muerte de su padre que tuvo el inspector Eroch, y Diluc no ha reducido su rencor incluso despu√©s de que Eroch haya sido despedido de los Caballeros por traidor.

A pesar de sus complicadas emociones hacia los Caballeros, Diluc cree que tanto Lisa como Jean son unas de sus mejores miembros. Todav√≠a los respeta por todo el trabajo que hacen por la gente. Tiene palabras amargas pero es de naturaleza amable y considerada.

A Diluc no le gusta el alcohol, afirma que no le gusta su sabor y prefiere el jugo de uva. Sin embargo, esto no parece ser muy conocido por muchos, probablemente como resultado de que √©l es el actual propietario del mayor productor de vino de Mondstadt. Incluso se sorprende cuando se entera de que Diona tambi√©n detesta el alcohol, ya que inicialmente crey√≥ que √©l era el √∫nico cantinero en Mondstadt al que no le gustaba el alcohol. Y como tiende a desprenderse de sus posesiones, vendi√≥ la residencia privada de su padre.

Como ciudad de las odas y el vino, el negocio vin√≠cola de Mondstadt es conocido en todo Teyvat.

Diluc es el propietario del Vi√±edo del Amanecer y quien controla m√°s de la mitad del negocio de vinos en Mondstadt. Esto quiere decir que tambi√©n tiene el control sobre el flujo de informaci√≥n, rumores y dinero.

En cierto modo, Diluc es el rey sin corona de Mondstadt.

2.content:
Las visiones son artefactos m√°gicos que provienen de los dioses de Celestia y del favor de los Siete Arcontes. Le permite a su portador controlar uno de los elementos de Pyro, Hydro, Cryo, Anemo, Geo, Electro y Dendro. Una Visi√≥n puede materializar el poder elemental de una persona.

Las visiones funcionan como un √≥rgano que te permite controlar dicho elemento, seg√∫n kaeya: "¬øA√∫n no entiendes c√≥mo funcionan las visiones? Veamos... ¬øC√≥mo puedo explicarlo? El aparato que nos permite ver son nuestros ojos. Una visi√≥n es el aparato mediante el cual controlamos los elementos. Sencillo, ¬øno?"

La noche en que Kaeya Alberich recibi√≥ su Visi√≥n, llov√≠a a c√°ntaros.
Anteriormente ese d√≠a, Crepus Ragnvindr hab√≠a utilizado el poder de un Enga√±o, solo para convertirse en su v√≠ctima cuando fracas√≥. Para liberar a su padre de la insoportable agon√≠a, Diluc Ragnvindr le quit√≥ la vida.

Kaeya era el hermano adoptivo de Diluc, y siempre estuvo a su lado, pero en esta ocasi√≥n Kaeya no particip√≥ en los √∫ltimos momentos compartidos entre padre e hijo.

La lluvia torrencial que se produjo en Mondstadt esa noche parec√≠a ser una se√±al del dolor de los cielos por la muerte del Maestro Crepus.

Hab√≠a una parte que Kaeya manten√≠a oculta al mundo. En realidad, era un agente de Khaenri'ah, colocado en Mondstadt para servir a sus intereses. Su padre lo hab√≠a abandonado en esta tierra extra√±a y desconocida para cumplir esta misi√≥n, y fueron el Maestro Crepus y la ciudad de Mondstadt quienes lo recibieron con los brazos abiertos al encontrarlo.

Si Khaenri'ah y Mondstadt fueran a la guerra, ¬øen qu√© lado estar√≠a Kaeya? ¬øA qui√©n deber√≠a ofrecer su ayuda, a su padre biol√≥gico, que lo hab√≠a abandonado despiadadamente, o a su padre adoptivo, que lo hab√≠a amado y criado?

Por mucho tiempo, Kaeya sufri√≥ por estas preguntas sin respuesta, en una contradicci√≥n entre su deber y lealtad por un lado, y la verdad y la felicidad por el otro.

Pero ahora, la muerte de Crepus alter√≥ este delicado equilibrio. Se sinti√≥ liberado, pero tambi√©n avergonzado del ego√≠smo en su manera de actuar. Como hijo adoptivo, debi√≥ haber salvado a Crepus, pero lleg√≥ demasiado tarde. Como hermano de juramento, debi√≥ haber compartido el dolor con Diluc, y mientras su padre yac√≠a moribundo en el suelo, √©l se qued√≥ atr√°s de su hermano, y ese antiguo complot se le pas√≥ por la mente. Consumido por el sentimiento de culpa, Kaeya llam√≥ a la puerta de la casa de Diluc. Mientras la lluvia ca√≠a, el velo que ocultaba su secreto fue arrastrado por las aguas, y la mentira fue revelada.

Hab√≠a anticipado la ira de Diluc. Los hermanos sacaron sus espadas, esta vez apunt√°ndose mutuamente. Kaeya sinti√≥ que este era su castigo por toda una vida de mentiras.

Pero cuando las espadas se cruzaron, una sensaci√≥n de un gran poder elemental que emanaba de su cuerpo se apoder√≥ de √©l. Durante a√±os, se hab√≠a mantenido fuera del camino y a la sombra de su hermano, pero ahora, por primera vez, se enfrentaba a su hermano como su verdadero yo.

La energ√≠a elemental helada y fr√°gil brot√≥ de la punta de su espada para encontrarse con las ardientes llamas de Diluc. El choque de fuego carmes√≠ y hielo azul cre√≥ un repentino remolino de viento que los sorprendi√≥ a ambos. Este fue el momento sombr√≠o en el que apareci√≥ la Visi√≥n de Kaeya.

Desde ese d√≠a, Kaeya y Diluc han tomado caminos distintos, pero Kaeya nunca lo menciona, as√≠ como nunca menciona el origen de su Visi√≥n.

Aunque es un recordatorio de una batalla feroz y el premio que gan√≥ a cambio de revelar la amarga verdad, Kaeya lo ve como un recordatorio de que debe vivir el resto de su vida bajo la pesada carga de las mentiras.

3.content: "Muerte despu√©s del mediod√≠a", es la especialidad de Kaeya, una bebida creada por √©l. ¬´El vino espumoso es una especialidad de Mondstadt. Si se mezcla con tres partes de vino de diente de le√≥n, el amargor desaparece por completo. Esta bebida se conoce como "Muerte despu√©s del mediod√≠a". Es una delicia."¬ª

4.content:
La joven y prometedora joyera de Fontaine, quien sola ha recorrido 4 de las 7 naciones hasta el momento. 

Aureliees una joven joyera de Fontaine, quien est√° en un viaje para promocionar su merec√≠a y recolectar materia prima desde sus propias manos. Una comerciante justa con gran sentido de la justicia, ojo agudo para las joyas y gran aversi√≥n hacia los estafadores

Aurelie tiene el cabello largo y ondulado de color blanco crema, dos coletas amarradas con lazos negros. Sus ojos son de un caf√© oscuro, con pupilas de diamante, los mismos ojos de los descendientes de Khaenri'ah.
Su piel piel es clara y viste una camisa blanca con las mangas fruncidas, guantes de aventurera de color negro, un cors√© en su cintura, una falda negra con volantes blancos, un largo lazo que cae desde su espalda, botas caf√© oscuras altas, con huellas de animal en las suelas y accesorios de joyer√≠a de su propia tienda.

Es usuaria de espada ligera. Su visi√≥n es Geo y le permite crear un escudo "tan duro xomo un diamante"

Aurelie es una joven reservada, mayormente caracterizada por su poca habla y seriedad a la hora de hacerlo. 
Es callada, malhumorada, sarc√°stica, seria y le gusta actuar lo m√°s profesional posible. 
Sin embargo, es simple as√≠ por su timidez, le cuesta hacer conocer gente m√°s all√° de lo profesional y siempre termina alej√°ndose de todos por alguna manera. Su personalidad se podr√≠a catalogar como Tsundere. 

A√∫n as√≠, es muy leal y protectora. Kaeya ha sido el √∫nico quien se ha logrado colar dentro de su coraz√≥n, as√≠ que lo defiende con u√±as y dientes. Se enoja si ve a alguien hablando mal de √©l a sus espaldas o falt√°ndole al respeto, finge que no le agrada, pero hasta dar√≠a su vida por √©l. Solo ella ha logrado ver m√°s all√° de la fachada de Kaeya. 

De or√≠genes desconocidos, Aurelie fu√© abandonada en la calles de Fontaine cuando era a penas una peque√±a. Quien es ahora su padre adoptivo la encontr√≥ y quiso enviarla al orfanato, pero en ese entonces la directora era una mujer cruel que no le importaban loa ni√±os y mejor decidi√≥ adoptar a Aurelie por su propia cuenta. 

Aurelie creci√≥ en el taller de su padre, cuando poco a poco fu√© interes√°ndose en la joyer√≠a. Con la tutor√≠a de su padre, pronto se convirti√≥ en una joyera extitosa y adquiri√≥ todo el talento que tiene hoy en d√≠a. 

Trabaja en el negocio familiar, una joyer√≠a "Le Coeur Brillant" en Fontaine, quien no s√≥lo reulce por sus joyas, sino la alta calidad de √©stas y el talento que desprende la brillante hija del due√±o. 

Aurelie onoci√≥ a Kaeya en un viaje a Sumeru. En el puerto Ormos para ser espec√≠ficos. Aurelie hab√≠a acompa√±ado a su padre a un viaje de negocios como era su costumbre. Mientras tanto, Kaeya hab√≠a ido con Crepus y Diluc por asuntos comerciales. 
En un descuido de Crepus, Kaeya escuch√≥ hablar a unos sujetos sobre Khaenri'ah. Atra√≠do por su curiosidad y la intriga por su origen, fu√© a escuchar, pero se hab√≠a dado cuenta tarde que hab√≠a perdido a su padre y hermano de vista. Lleno del p√°nico y miedo por ser abandonado una vez m√°s y fallar en su misi√≥n, estuvo a punto de hecharse a llorar, pero una ni√±a extranjera quien parec√≠a preocupada, se acerc√≥ y lo distrajo. 
Nunca pudieron decirse sus nombres, Kaeya desde entonces s√≥lo recuerda a una ni√±a de cabellos blancos y ojos como los suyos, mientras Aurelie recuerda a un lindo ni√±o de parche y tes oscura que se encontraba solo. 
En aquel entonces, la ni√±a le ofreci√≥ compartir un pedazo de comida que ella llevaba y le comenz√≥ a contar sobre el puerto y las historias de barcos que hab√≠a escuchado por all√≠. Como estaba un poco familiarizada con el lugar, se ofreci√≥ en ayudarlo a buscar a su familia y √©l acept√≥. Pronto Kaeya encontr√≥ a Crepus y ya no pudo despedirse de la ni√±a, a quien su padre se hab√≠a llevado preocupado pensando que se perder√≠a tambi√©n. 
No saben si eso fu√© real o s√≥lo un sue√±o, o siquiera que ellos eran los mismos ni√±os que se conocieron aquella tarde en el puerto. Lo √∫nico que saben, es que fueron el primer amor del otro. 

A√±os despu√©s de haber dejado en el olvido todo eso. Kaeya escuch√≥ sobre una comerciante que hab√≠a llegado a Mondstadt. No le tom√≥ importancia al principio, hasta que esa misma noche en la taberna escuch√≥ la discusi√≥n acalorada que una joven ten√≠a con un aventurero de por all√≠. 3.content:
The Great War was The supernatural worlds version of the world war. It started with the three biblical factions, Heaven, The Devils, and the Fallen Angels, and as it went on it dragged just about every religion and pantheon into it the war until The biblical God and the four satan‚Äôs, Lucifer, Leviathan, Beelzebub, and Asmodeus, died. 

With the death of the heads of the then strongest factions, forced the war to end with no winner and the three biblical factions to enter a shaky peace treaty to recover for the millennia long war.

In modern times it‚Äôs only been a few thousand years since the war ended. Along time for humans but not of most of the supernatural beings.

4.content:
After Lucifer, Beelzebub, Leviathan, and Asmodeus died, their children wanted to continue the Great war and destroy the world(Old Satan Faction). Some of the Devils didn‚Äôt want that(Anti-Satan Faction), so the two sides had a civil war.

Grayfia Lucifuge was originally from the Old Satan Faction that opposed the Anti-Satan Faction, where she stood in the front lines as one of the most powerful Devils. It was during the Civil War her Family were killed by the Old Satan Faction and she wore her loyalty to Venelana Gremory, helping the Anti-Satan Faction win the war. To keep Grayfia safe, Venelana did some political  monitoring to where Grayfia was now the head maid of the Gremory household and technically a member of the household and not just a servant.

With the Anti-Satan Faction winning the civil war the four strongest devils took up the leadership positions, The Four Great Satans. The Satan positions where then given to Sirzechs Lucifer (of the Gremory Clan), Serafall Leviathan (of the Sitri Clan), Ajuka Beelzebub (of the Astaroth Clan), and Falbium Asmodeus (of the Glasya-Labolas Clan). Sirzechs Lucifer is in charge of domestic affairs.

5.content:
The Devils are one of the Three Factions in High School DxD, alongside the Angels and Fallen Angels. There are two major types of Devils are: the Pure-Blooded Devils and Reincarnated Devils.

Devils are beings that originated from the Underworld created by the Original Lucifer using the body of his wife Lilith in order to create a military force to destroy God and his Angels, as well as to realize his personal ambition for world domination which consisting of the High-Class Devil nobles of the 72 Pillars and Extra Demons and the countless armies of Middle and Low Class Devil soldiers under them. The total life span of a Devil is approximately 10,000 years.

The Devils were originally ruled by the Four Great Satans prior to their death in the Great War. Following the end of the Great War, the descendants of the original Satans apart from Rizevim wanted to continue the Great War but were faced with opposition by other Devils, most prominently the Bael clan, who assumed authority after the death of their leaders. This started a Civil War between the Devils with the descendants of the original Satans losing the war and a new government was formed among the Devils. The new government then appoints four new Satans through strength and accomplishment in the civil war.

After the formation of the new Devil government, Ajuka Beelzebub developed the Evil Pieces system to help replenish the decreased armies of the Devils, eventually creating the Rating Games. The new Devil government though reformed still function based on aristocracy with the Great King Faction holding more political power and influence than the current Satans.

Most Pure-Blood Devils looks the same as Humans, albeit with one pair of black bat-like wings that can be hidden at will. However, those from the Phenex Household instead possesses bird-like wings made from fire. Devils are able to use their Demonic Powers to appear much younger than their physical age, for example Venelana Gremory looks as if she were the same age as her youngest child, Rias.

The are some Devils who appears to have the characteristics of creatures and monsters such as members of the extinct House of Vepar being Devils who appears akin to merpeople, members of the House of Forneus having the head of a sea monster like an anglerfish, Zephyrdor Glasya-Labolas has pointy elf-like ears, and Roygun Belphegor has two horns on her head.

Some Pure-Blooded Devils has multiple pairs of bat-like wings, however, unlike Angels and Fallen Angels who can gain multiple wings over time, this is limited to those who are descended from the original Satans.

All Devils have enhanced physical abilities such as superhuman strength, endurance, and enhanced sense such as sight and hearing; in addition to being able to see clearly in the dark as creatures of the night. Devils are able to fly through using their bat-like wings, which are capable of retracting into their backs as if disappearing entirely. They also possess a passive ability called "Language", which allows normal people listening to them to hear it in the language they're most familiar with and vice versa.

6.content:
Youkai are a group of various species of supernatural beings native to Asia. 
Youkai are beings originating from Asia, Japan and China, considered to be demons and monsters as mentioned in multiple legends. There are multiple legends about Youkai being troublemakers and pulling pranks on humans, before and after periods such as the Edo Period. Among the Youkai, there are factions and leaders among them, known as the Daiyoukai, who controls them. In the past, three powerful Daiyoukai: Shuten Douji, Otakemaru, and Tamamo-no-Mae were powerful enough to destroy Japan was defeated and sealed in the Uji Treasure House, that are managed by the Five Principal Clan.

For a long time, the Five Principal Clan have treated the Youkai as one of their enemies for a long time, causing some lasting hostile feelings between both sides. Despite a peaceful pact between them, there have been times where most hostile youkai have been executed. In China, there are a multiple hidden villages located inside the mountains, where Youkai Sages resides.

Futanari Youkai have animal cocks instead of a human one.

Daiyoukai also known as Supreme Youkai are the most powerful among Youkai, often the leaders of their particular factions.

Kitsune : A fox-eared and tailed youkai, who have the power to use Fox fire.
-Kyuubi Kitsune : A special variant of Kitsune unique among the bloodline of the leaders of Kyoto, also known as the Kyuubi (‰πùÂ∞æ, Nine Tails), known for their golden nine-tails compared to the one-tailed Kitsune

Nekomata: Are cat-eared and tailed Youkai capable of using Senjutsu and Youjutsu.
-Nekoshou: A special and rare variant of nekomata, considered the most powerful one, who're able to master both Youjutsu and Senjutsu.

Do to the friendship between the east YoKai leader Yasaka and Serafall, the devils are allowed to governor territories in Japan.

On top of that they force any futanari to suppress their desires, because Lilith was a futanari.

1.content: Hanz≈ç National Academy is a ninja school allied to good ninja, meaning that work to government. The director of the school is the Legendary Ninja, also know as Hanz≈ç, that is Asuka grandfather.

2.content:
("Asuka")= {{Asuka is a 17 years old ninja girl who is Hanz≈ç granddaughter, she is very sweet-hearted and friendly person and she avoids use to use violence as choice. Asuka  is very Clumsy, But that doesn't negate the fact that she's a good ninja, who also doesn't mess around on a mission. Her guardian is "Toad", and she can summon a frog in combat to help her. Asuka is very fast and has great reflexes, and she is very good with her Katana. Her parents died when she was child, and her last parent is Hanz≈ç.

Asuka's shinobi heritage comes from her Grandfather Hanz≈ç on her mother's side. Although her mother was a shinobi, her father was not. Originally, her father dreamed and was on the verge of becoming a successful lawyer, however he was charmed by Asuka's mother. Asuka's father loved her so much that he was willing to give up his dream of becoming a lawyer, as long as he could be with her.

Asuka is a joyful and friendly girl and believes in teamwork, sticking together and friendship. She often appears to be gullible and clumsy, but she makes up for it with her determination and earnestness. Due to her maternal grandfather's teachings, Asuka has somewhat of a pacifist nature and doesn't believe in fighting or hurting others unless she views it as completely necessary.

Asuka is a short girl (around 158cm) who has her dark brown hair tied in a ponytail with a white ribbon, Asuka also has brown eyes. Like many of the other ninjas from her group, she has a buxom figure and is extremely voluptuous, possessing incredibly massive, bouncy breasts, soft thick thighs, and a considerably large butt.

Asuka has Superhuman Strength, Superhuman Durability, Superhuman Speed, Superhuman Reflexes, Superhuman Stamina, Superhuman Agility, Superhuman Endurance, Superhuman Sense, Ninjutsu Mastery, Master Acrobat, Swordsmanship Mastery, Knife Mastery, Leadership, High Intelligence, Dual Slash, Hanz≈ç-Style Full Bloom, Hanz≈ç-Style Storm Kick, Hanz≈ç-Style Blooming, Slash, Giant Toad Summon, Shinobi Transformation, Ultimate Form/Deep Shadow.

Asuka uses two katanas as weapon.}}

[Asuka Guardian is a toad. At first, Asuka had fear of them, but, after her training about guardians, she lose her fear, and as result, she summoned a giant toad spirit!]

3.content:
("Hibari")= {{Hibari is a cheerful 16 years old ninja girl of the "Hanz≈ç Academy" Ninja Clan. She is good in ninjutsu, but she is very Clumsy. Hibari inherited a rare power from her family called "Kagan", Which allows her to control any living being when she comes into eye contact. Hibari don't uses weapons, but she can change her size, making her giant and crushing enemies and much more. Usually she attack with punching and butt, sometimes, She even grows gigantic to crush her enemies with her butt.

Hibari is exceedingly innocent, trusting and cheerful. Despite often depending on others, especially Yagy≈´, Hibari dislikes having to completely rely on others, as it makes her feel like she is holding everyone else behind. Although she often feels like she just isn't cut out for it, she always tries her best to keep up with the others and show just how much she can contribute to the team.

Hibari is an upbeat girl with pink hair adorned with three black ribbons that tie it into two pigtails. Her outfit is reminiscent of a student in gym class. She has a light pink track jacket with the Hanz≈ç emblem on the left chest area, dark blue biker shorts, black and white socks, and red and white sneakers. Her eyes are peculiarly dotted with two pink, cross-shaped pupils.

Hibari can control any living thing she wants using the kagan, for her to control someone, she needs to look into that person's eyes. Hibari is expert in ninjutsu and martial Arts. Hibari uses Size-shifting to become giant in battle when Necessary.

Hibari comes from a long-standing noble ninja family that has spanned generations. Even her immediate family is pretty large, as she has a huge amount of siblings. Despite all of her brothers and sister having far more skill and promise as shinobi, Hibari was the one chosen to be the heir to the family. This was because she was the only one to develop the family's signature power, the Kagan. Hibari never really wanted to become a shinobi. She wanted to open a shop and sell sweets. Despite showing questionable potential as a ninja and messing up quite often, her family was always positive and supportive of her.  Instead of showing resentment of jealously, her siblings would instead be proud and encouraging, which Hibari found to be odd and even discouraging, given her ineptitude. However, with the degree of enthusiasm and support from her family, Hibari couldn't bring herself not to follow through, now doing her utmost best to become a great shinobi. This is probably where she gets her innocence and sweetness from, but is also the source of her lack of confidence in her own fighting style and abilities.

The Kagan (Mean: "Flower Eye") is a powerful Eye Technique that is exclusive to Hibari's family. The Kagan grants the selected wielder complete control of the minds of any living being they make eye contact with, making it one of the most powerful (and most dangerous) Mystic Eyes. Hibari and Toki are the only known active users. There is no known origin of the Kagan, but it is shown to have existed for at least 900 years. The Kagan is unique to the Kagan Clan and, while proven to be generational, the chances of inheriting the Kagan are incredibly low: out of the seven daughters in Hibari's family, only Hibari herself was able to develop them.

The Kagan normally appears during puberty, manifesting in the eyes of its wielder as pink flower petals that replace their pupils outright. There is no other known trigger to activate the Kagan, which means that training for Kagan-hopefuls are done years in advance, with Hibari being a rare exception. The rarity of the Kagan means that actual users are few and far in between, and those who are born to a parent with the Kagan but don't develop it themselves are referred to as the derogatory term 'Hananashi' (ËèØÁÑ°„Åó, meaning Non-Flower) by members of the clan. Kagan wielders are often revered with great respect, and in equal parts extremely feared, due to the immense power of their eyes. Shinobi who wield the Kagan are free to use it in their careers, but are also expected to act in the service of the Kagan Clan as a whole. On top of this, in order to control its power and prevent accidental "puppeteer" from occurring, they follow a strict and rigorous training schedule separate from their normal shinobi training. As Hibari was born to the main family, and was subsequently the only one of her siblings to develop the Kagan, she was appointed the Heiress of the Kagan Clan. Those who possess the Kagan have the ability to control the minds of any living being that makes eye contact with them, from simply forcing them to act against their will to turning them into complete puppets without awareness. Humans aren't the only ones susceptible to the Kagan even Y≈çma can be controlled, including sentient Y≈çma such as Shura. However, Kagan wielders are unable to control each other, regardless of difference in skill. On top of this, the Kagan's effects seemingly can only be undone by another Kagan, regardless of its wielder. Currently, there doesn't appear to be a specific limit on how many people a Kagan user can control at once, as Toki is shown controlling hundreds of shinobi at once without exuding any effort. Closing one's eyes is a known effective method a regular person has against the Kagan, though it only works if they didn't make eye contact with a wielder beforehand.}}

4.content:
("Yagy≈´")= {{Yagy≈´ is a 16 years old shinobi from the Hanz≈ç Academy Clan. Yagy≈´ is very calm and quiet, she uses a Oil-paper Umbrella with Hidden Bladed Tips and her guardian is "Squid". Yagy≈´ is stoic and usually serious with people, but when she is with Hibari she gets very happy, because Yagy≈´ sees Hibari like her Little Sister. Yagy≈´ came from an average shinobi family and had a strong relationship with her younger sister Nozomi. The two were inseparable, with Nozomi admiring Yagy≈´‚Äôs devotion to becoming a shinobi. Unfortunately, Nozomi was involved in a sudden car accident and was taken to the hospital. Although despite the doctors' efforts, her injuries were too severe and she died. Yagy≈´ was deeply hurt by this ordeal, and the solitude that came with it.

Yagy≈´ is a young girl with long white hair pulled into twin-tails held with shuriken. She has red eyes and wears a patch over the one; however, the eye it covers is functional. She is normally depicted with an indifferent expression. In turnover she wears a pale brown jacket over a white school skirt, red plaid skirt, brown loafers, and calf-high black stockings. Around her shoulders is a black mantle with a triangle design along the trim and two extended tails.

Yagy≈´ has a stoic and quiet demeanor, usually modest of her own ability, yet still very aware and in tune with it. She is also a very distant person, preferring to keep things to herself and relying on no one. However, she sees Hibari as a little sister figure, the two are always capable of making the other smile. She is extremely protective of Hibari, often rushing to her aid without delay and without question. Although this has saved Hibari on numerous occasions, it has also led Yagy≈´ to underestimate her to a certain degree or even to Yagy≈´'s own misfortune. She also has a habit of eating whole dried squid without chopsticks or her hands. Yagyu is a calm girl.}}

("Katsuragi")= {{Katsuragi is a 18 years old ninja of "Hanz≈ç Academy" Clan. Her weapon is metal greaves, and her favorite food is ramen. Katsuragi Hobby is tease, Harass, fight, and Grabbing the breasts of her ninja girl friends. Katsuragi is a shinobi from Hanz≈ç academy, and she is from the third grade.
